name: lit-element
description: A simple base class for creating fast, lightweight web components

scripts.gen-docs: typedoc --readme docs/_api/api-readme.md --tsconfig tsconfig_apidoc.json --mode modules --theme docs/_api/theme --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --ignoreCompilerErrors --exclude '{**/*test*,**/node_modules/**,**/test/**}' --out ./docs/api --gaID UA-39334307-23 src/**/*.ts
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build:babel-test && karma-proxy run --single-run
scripts.test:persist: npm run build && npm run build:babel-test && karma-proxy run
scripts.test:polyfills: npm run build && npm run build:babel-test && POLYFILLS= karma-proxy run --single-run && POLYFILLS=wc-shadydom karma-proxy run --single-run && POLYFILLS=wc-shadydom,wc-ce karma-proxy run --single-run && POLYFILLS=wc-shadydom,wc-ce,wc-shimcssproperties karma-proxy run --single-run
scripts.format: find src test | grep '\.js$\|\.ts$' | xargs clang-format --style=file -i
scripts.prepublishOnly: node check-version-tracker.js && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.publish-dev: npm test && VERSION=${npm_package_version%-*}-dev.`git rev-parse --short HEAD` && npm version --no-git-tag-version $VERSION && npm publish --tag dev

author: The Polymer Authors
